Downloads

Particl Desktop is our flagship product and is the best application to begin using PART. All available and in-development features are bundled in Desktop.

v1.1.0

Particl Desktop

Particl Desktop is Particl’s main GUI wallet. It’s beautiful and feature-rich client, recommended for most users.

Installation Guide
Windows, 64-bit Linux, 64-bit (tar .gz) Mac OS X, 64-bit Windows, 32-bit Linux, 64-bit Source code (.zip)
v0.15.1.2

Particl Core QT

Particl Qt is suitable for everyone and highly recommended for beginners, as it's feature-rich, user-friendly and easy to setup. Download latest release, double-click Particl executable (in bin/ directory) and you're done.

Installation Guide
Windows, 64-bit Linux, 64-bit (tar .gz) Mac OS X, 64-bit Windows, 32-bit Linux, 32-bit Source code (.zip)
v0.15.1.2

Particl-cli

Particl-cli offers all the essential features, but doesn't include all the advanced bells and whistles of Particl graphical clients. Particl-cli is recommended for advanced users.

Installation Guide
Github
v3.7.1.2

Particl Copay

Copay is a secure particl wallet platform for both desktop and mobile devices.

Download Particl Copay (Android)
Download Particl Copay (Win / macOS / Linux)

Particl Copay

Feature
Opensource
